TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: ManagementName 属性用于替代通过 WMI 类公开的名称。

span.span: The ManagementName attribute is used to override names exposed through a WMI class.

summary.span: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
The [MI APIs](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/wmi_v2/windows-management-infrastructure) should be used for all new development.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: name
param.span: 该对象的用户友好名称。

span.span: The user-friendly name for the object.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的用户友好名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the user-friendly name for an object.

summary.span: 该对象可以是方法参数，也可以是用 ManagementProbe、ManagementKey 或 ManagementConfiguration 特性标记的属性。

span.span: The object can be a method parameter or properties marked with the ManagementProbe, ManagementKey, or ManagementConfiguration attributes.

value.span: 一个 值，指示对象的用户友好名称。

span.span: A value that indicates the user friendly name for an object.
